name: Laitida
description:
"You've been separated from your love by the evil Fungi.
Lost in a mystic ancient well, will you succeed in fighting the dark power of Sunny Green Forest ?"

Half platformer, half shooter, Laitida lets you play with a real time animated blob in a 100% coded graphics world.

Controls:
Arrow keys - Moving the blob
X, Ctrl, Space - Shooting during the second game phase
M - Toogle Music and/or SFX
